title: Which phone is cheaper in Dubai than in india? - Quora

response.answer_text: Almost all phones in the UAE are cheaper compared to India. The phones might not be as cheap compared to Indian prices as they once used to be because of the recent introduction of vat charges,(which was also introduced here because of a visit by none other than your Indian prime minister Mr.Modi) the prices are now not that profitable that it’s gonna make you travel all the way from India to UAE an buy a phone from here. In theory, most of the phones in the UAE are cheaper than in India but in practice, only a marginal difference.
all smartphones are cheaper in Dubai because here India charges gst tax that's why the prices of phone increases thats why people buy smartphones from dubai.
